game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is unraveling. Players take on the role of a Timekeeper, tasked with repairing the timestream and uncovering the truth behind a catastrophic event that has shattered the balance of power.
game.beginning: The game begins in the city of Chronos, where the Timekeeper discovers a cryptic message from an unknown sender. The message speaks of a ancient artifact hidden deep within the ruins of a long-lost civilization, capable of restoring time to its proper course.
game.ending: As players repair the timestream and confront the mastermind behind the catastrophic event, they uncover a shocking revelation: the true enemy is not a villain, but a future version of themselves. With this knowledge, the Timekeeper must make an impossible choice: save the world or sacrifice their own existence to prevent the damage from being done.
